data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=JbCWWu81pv4Q7kNvgFJOFzF&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCY5z2J4D30iI_N7bvJV-M4tVBczk0gx44z4CXdM4SSMw&oe=6659B2B7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=A3XUHbwlZTUQ7kNvgEOz_DL&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAM2bb-jQ4lMSu7Z_lK0u4QPFiRSv4aNvnWZFZc6ZpRVQ&oe=6659C052)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982555_716104293832637_6157177355803125122_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=8TaAFoD7VvQQ7kNvgFdRmMX&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB8XICMnXgCl0zlyCTZz1VyBruAk_Z3WDup9dsR5U0lpw&oe=6659C3D0)
